option.name: myStatusName
option.value: Will be merged with property conflicts

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: Minor changes: demo title and import cleanup.

MESSAGE.value: Added more options for specifying padding including a Number or a list of 0, 1, 2, 3, or 4 Numbers (follows the CSS spec for specifying padding). Added the PaddingTest script to illustrate the new padding options. Corrected a bug in SceneFactory that was making any Control added under the "scene" node the root of the scene graph (i.e. a Control is-a Parent too). Renamed SceneWrapper.parent to SceneWrapper.root to be less confusing to my tiny brain. Added IntelliJ IDEA project files.
Added factories for LinearGradient, RadialGradient, and Stop. Update the GradientTest.groovy script with more examples of the new DSL syntax for declaring gradients.
Added FillFactory and StrokeFactory, modified the GradientDemo, and added a new FillAndStrokeDemo program. The gradients no longer automatically add themselves to their parent node.
Converted ShapeFactory, PathFactory, and PathElementFactory to the pattern of taking a class parameter in their constructors to eliminate the switch statements.
Updated the SwingGroovyFX demo to make it a simple browser application.
Changed the blend demo a little to make the effect more obvious. Fixed a close problem with the swing demo.
Updated blend demo again to include the mouse press handler from the interview code.
Minor changes: demo title and import cleanup.
